author: elenavernazza
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a small bug introduced in PR #48745.
It only affects a script used for jet validation plotting.

#### PR validation:

This PR has been tested by running the plotter on a DQM file.

```
makeHLTJetValidationPlots.py --file DQM_V0001_R000000001__Global__CMSSW_X_Y_Z__RECO.root --jet hltAK4PFPuppiJets
```
title: [NGT] Bug fix for jet validation plotter
